heroTitle: Power your marketing with AI Agents
heroSubtitle: Automate your Email, WhatsApp, and Social Media campaigns with intelligent orchestration. Focus on strategy, AI handles execution.
feature1Desc: AI agents that create, send, and optimize your campaigns 24/7.
feature2Desc: Manage Email, WhatsApp, Instagram, and LinkedIn from a single interface.
feature3Desc: Anticipate performance and maximize ROI with data analysis.
channelsTitle: All your channels in one place
channelsSubtitle: AI-driven campaigns on Email, WhatsApp, Instagram, Facebook and TikTok.
integrationDiagramDescription: Lynara integrates your favorite channels: email, messaging, social media and video into one AI-driven workflow. One dashboard to orchestrate everything.
aiCardSuggestions: Summarize updates,Rewrite copy,Segment audience,Schedule sends,Create campaigns,Analyze performance,Optimize creatives
aiCardDescription: Need to create campaigns, plan sends, or run your channels? Just ask Lynara. One button lets you do everything in seconds.
